channel.title: Organic acids on venoMS

item.title: 4-Guanidinobutyric acid
item.description: General Description Name Value Level S-1 / C-2 Link Discovered 2020 / P. bistriata & P. viridans Synonym Molecular formula C₅H₁₁N₃O₂ CAS 463-00-3 SMILES OC(CCCNC(N)=N)=O InChI InChI=1S/C5H11N3O2/c6-5(7)8-3-1-2-4(9)10/h1-3H2,(H,9,10)(H4,6,7,8) Precursor 1 [M+H]⁺ 146.09240 Precursor 2 Precursor 3 HDX 5 Precursor HDX 1 [M(D₅)+D]⁺ 152.

item.title: Citric acid

item.title: GABA

item.title: Lactic acid

item.title: Uric acid
